title: Introduction to Yoga
content: Yoga is a holistic practice originating in ancient India that combines physical postures, breathing techniques, and mindfulness to promote overall well-being.

title: Benefits of Yoga
content: Regular yoga practice can improve flexibility, balance, strength, posture, and mental clarity. It may also help reduce stress and improve sleep quality.

title: Yoga for Beginners
content: Beginners should start with simple poses, focus on proper alignment, and move slowly while coordinating movement with breath.

title: Advanced Yoga Practices
content: Advanced yoga includes complex poses that require strength, balance, and flexibility, and should be practiced with guidance.

title: Common Standing Poses
content: Standing poses such as Mountain Pose and Warrior Pose help improve balance, posture, and leg strength.

title: Seated Yoga Poses
content: Seated poses are commonly used for stretching the hips and spine and for meditation and breathing practices.

title: Forward Bends in Yoga
content: Forward bending poses stretch the back body and can promote relaxation when practiced gently.

title: Backbends in Yoga
content: Backbends strengthen the spine and open the chest, but should be approached carefully to avoid strain.

title: Twisting Poses
content: Twisting poses help improve spinal mobility and support digestion when practiced mindfully.

title: Inversions in Yoga
content: Inversions reverse the effects of gravity and can improve circulation, but they require proper technique and caution.

title: Contraindications in Yoga
content: Certain yoga poses may not be suitable for individuals with medical conditions such as hernia, glaucoma, or recent surgery.

title: Yoga During Pregnancy
content: Prenatal yoga emphasizes gentle movement, breathing, and relaxation while avoiding intense or inverted poses.

title: Pranayama Basics
content: Pranayama refers to breathing techniques that help regulate energy and calm the nervous system.

title: Anulom Vilom Breathing
content: Anulom Vilom is a gentle breathing practice that promotes relaxation and balance.

title: Kapalbhati Breathing
content: Kapalbhati is an active breathing technique that should be practiced cautiously and under guidance.

title: Yoga for Stress Relief
content: Slow movements, gentle stretching, and mindful breathing in yoga can help reduce stress.

title: Yoga for Flexibility
content: Consistent yoga practice improves muscle elasticity and joint mobility over time.

title: Yoga for Balance
content: Balancing poses enhance coordination and strengthen stabilizing muscles.

title: Restorative Yoga
content: Restorative yoga uses supported poses to promote deep relaxation and recovery.

title: Yoga Safety Guidelines
content: Practicing within personal limits, avoiding pain, and seeking qualified instruction are key to safe yoga practice.
